prompts:
Fix all 4 critical security issues NOW. This is a local repo (not pushed anywhere), so we can safely remove all exposed credential files.

Execute in this order:
1. Delete .env.test file
2. Delete both .env.backup files  
3. Find and delete any other .env backup files
4. Update .gitignore to exclude all .env files
5. Fix path traversal vulnerability in zai_tools.py
6. Redact any remaining API keys from documentation files
7. Create .env.test.example template
8. Verify all fixes complete

Report detailed summary when done.
